snippet: The host of “This American Life” and co-writer of the coming film “Sleepwalk With Me” would like to meet Edgar Allan Poe. “I don’t have a question, but dude just seems like he could use a hug.”
abstract: By the Book interview with Ira Glass, host of radio show This American Life host, who says author he would most like to meet would be Edgar Allan Poe.
lead_paragraph: The host of “This American Life” and co-writer of the coming film “Sleepwalk With Me” would like to meet Edgar Allan Poe. “I don’t have a question, but dude just seems like he could use a hug.”
